name: Swiss Create Business Manager
short_description:
Swiss Create Business Manager is an excellent software for you to start a business with a simple system which guide you step by step, with friendly design connecting all of elements of business must be together to help you got a deep look on your business status. 

SCBM's features include: Business Model, SWOT Analysis, Business Strategy, Sucess Factors, Review Details, Evaluation: Interpretation of Results, Measures, Marketing Plans, Finance, Risk Management, Budget Plan and Chart, Conclusion & Report.

The special value of this software is you can translate questions and module titles directly on your screen without need any IT skill, this means it would reduce a lot of expenses for your project in translation if you are working in other languages.
summary: An excellent software for you to start a business with a simple system
